title: Shatterclasses
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:minimalist-bhl]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
  --header-title: "The Shattered One";
  --header-subtitle: "Containment Images inc.";
  --lgurl: url("http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/the-shattered-one/skipos");
  --accentColor: COLOR HERE;
}

[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[=]]
[[include component:ratio-bar pie=--]]

**ShallweYesweshall's art page**
Created by [[*user ShallweYesweshall]]
[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[/>]]

+* For basic ACS, see the [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/anomaly-classification-system-guide|ACS guide]]]

How to use:

> 
> [[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
> 
> |item-number= XXXX
> 
> |clearance= #
> 
> |container-class= esoteric
> 
> |secondary-class= secondary containment class (Order)
> 
> |secondary-icon= Order selector url here
> 
> |disruption-class= 
> 
> |risk-class= 
> 
> ]]
> 

Note: If you would like to see a specific class on this list, feel free to send me a PM.

[[tabview]]
[[tab Order #1]]
Aether
[[image https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/shatterclasses/Aether]]
Order selector url:
https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/shatterclasses/Aether
[[/tab]]
[[tab Order #2]]
Molecular
[[image https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/shatterclasses/Molecular]]
Order selector url:
https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/shatterclasses/Molecular

Description:
Item affects matter on the molecular level
[[/tab]]
[[tab Order #3]]
MOSKSTRAUMEN
[[image https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/shatterclasses/MOSKSTRAUMEN]]
Order selector url:
https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/shatterclasses/MOSKSTRAUMEN

Description:
Item is a interdimensional gateway that leads to a hazardous reality.
[[/tab]]
[[tab Order #4]]
Safe
[[image https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/shatterclasses/Safe]]
Order selector url:
https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/shatterclasses/Safe
[[/tab]]
[[tab Order #5]]
Simpatico

Order Selector url:
http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/the-shattered-one/Simpatico
[[/tab]]
[[tab Order #6]]
Hades
[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/the-shattered-one/Hades]]
Order Selector url:
http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/the-shattered-one/Hades

Description:
Item is a hostile cosmic entity.
[[/tab]]
[[tab Order #7]]
Unknown
[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/the-shattered-one/unknown]]
Order Selector url:
http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/the-shattered-one/unknown
[[/tab]]
[[tab Order #8]]
N/A

Order Selector url:
http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/the-shattered-one/N_A
[[/tab]]
[[tab Order #9]]
Tempest
[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/the-shattered-one/Excalibur]]
Order Selector url:
http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/the-shattered-one/Excalibur

Description: 
Containment of item would disrupt trade routes and, therefore, would break the Veil of Secrecy.
[[/tab]]
[[tab Order #10]]
Expunged
[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/the-shattered-one/expunged]]
Order Selector url:
http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/the-shattered-one/expunged

Description:
Item description expunged for the safety of the reader.
[[/tab]]
[[tab Order #11]]
Gleipnir
[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:shattered-art/Gleipnir]]

[[tab Order #12]]
Verax
[[image verax]]
Order Selector url:
https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:shattered-art/verax

Description:
Item was created by the Foundation but has turned against the Foundation.
[[/tab]]
